Name: Subscript
Function: Draw the text smaller and lower than regular text

Name: Superscript
Function: Draw the text smaller and higher than regular text

Name: Text highlight color
Function: Add a highlight color which displays behind the text

Name: Decrease indent
Function: Decrease the indent levelof the paragraph

Name: Increase indent
Function: Increase the indent level of the paragraph

Name: Start a list
Function: Click the arrow to choose different list style

Name: Line Spacing
Function: Change the spacing between lines of text. Add or remove the space after paragraphs.

Name: Underline
Function: Draw a line below the text

Name: Strikethrough
Function: Draw a line through the text
